text_block_list.text: I think Nice Nature was previously determined to run in this race, aiming to defeat Tokai Teio, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, well—
When I heard the best Nature was running,
I just couldn't sit still.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
What's that all about~,
Saying such cute things.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...I think you remember,
Today, I'm challenging with my full power!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I won't hold back against you either,
So keep that in mind!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Yeah!
I'll also challenge Nature with my full power!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Today, with full power, let's do our best!
